pullrequest.title: gzserver now compiles with node v6

content.raw:
@hugomatic @chapulina 
 Hi, has been some time :),
Since there no tests for gzweb yet, would you please have a look, this PR would enable users to use Node [V6 and V7] at least.
and about the gzweb_2 branch, I've had an idea of forcing the garbage collector which might solve the weird memory leakage there.
content.html: @hugomatic @chapulina Hi, has been some time :), Since there no tests for gzweb yet, would you please have a look, this PR would enable users to use Node [V6 and V7] at least. and about the gzweb_2 branch, I've had an idea of forcing the garbage collector which might solve the weird memory leakage there.
